attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: First of all when I opened up the app I saw a dinosaur singing the abc’s. After that my phone crashed and it took a hour for it to get back on.

attributes.title: This app is trash
attributes.review: I got it thinking it would make a difference in the world nope it only supports this irrelevant  ignorant orange man that we’re supposed call our president. Welp I hope this review helps the cause

attributes.title: I’m tearing up
attributes.review: This app was the worst thing I’ve ever downloaded. Honestly, it was so bad my whole family started uncontrollably crying at the sight of it. Don’t bother getting this. Save your tears :)

attributes.title: I Am Disgusted
attributes.review: I was trust trying to support the second to christ president donald trump when i came across a picture of him spray tanning naked with his tiny little pp. I am repulsed and will never be using this app again. good day.

attributes.title: 🤮🤮DO NOT DOWNLOAD🤢🤮🤮
attributes.review: This app is very disgusting as soon as I open the app I’m met with a pig sweating like it was it’s last day. I’m surprised that clowns support this man he is absolutely disgusting and doesn’t deserve to even set foot in the White House

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever. It takes up to much data and space and it glitches. It also took my dog and my dad. And it made my phone blow up so now I’m chillen with the dinosaurs eating Dino nuggets.

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: this is quite possibly the worst app i have downloaded. if i could rate it 0 stars i would. it made my phone glitch so much it blew up in my face. my cat is now dead as he was sitting next to me when it went off. i am currently writing this on my old ipod touch and i am worried that it will blow up too. whatever you do do not download this app🤧🤧🤧🤧

attributes.title: horrific.
attributes.review: if i could put into more words how disgusting this app is i would. for starters, as soon as i entered the app i encountered a wrinkled and rotten orange. it was like it thought it was a raisin. the more i looked at it i just felt like i was aging because of how pinched my own face was. im sorry for the makers of this app who thought it was okay to put me in such a position that makes me gag. never download this app. 😾

attributes.title: horrible remove immediately
attributes.review: i was just trying to support my orange faced cheeto king but this awfully designed and programmed app glitched out and gave my phone a virus 😡😡😡 not to mention that after downloading it i realized i’m not a white supremacist and that this app gives a platform for a racist, sexist rapist to promote fake news to a large audience of equally idiotic bootlickers 😫😫😫 take this awful app down immediately

attributes.title: Insensitive
attributes.review: This app is highly incentive to millions like I download this app and then I started getting random notifications from the app even tho I don’t have notifications on then I started seeing trump in my NIGHTMARES THIS APP IS A NIGHTMARE
